name: Hero (itch) (Kalend Studio)
description:
Summary:

You're finally in the last part of the journey of your life. The last step is ahead of you, but as always, there's a catch.

Uncover the way of the tiles, and learn with the loop to defeat the flamy skull and find what the future holds for you.

Each time you open up the game it will be different and you'll have to learn the loop again.

If you're a brave one, take on the challenge of the acquiring all achievements, and see if you really got what it takes.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys or the WASD keys to move around.

Credits:

Gabriel Luís Duarte Pittol -> Programmer/Audio

Pedro Augusto Ruppenthal -> Artist/Game Designer
